name: Chaosmon
effect: ＜Piercing＞ (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon and survives the battle, it performs any security checks it normally would.)[When Digivolving] Unsuspend this Digimon. Then, it can attack your opponent's Digimon. This effect allows you to attack unsuspended Digimon as well.
